subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
Sales
lead_paragraph: FIFA said more than 130,000 of 500,000 tickets for the World Cup had been sold less than two days after over-the-counter sales began last week at ticketing centers and some bank branches.
snippet: FIFA said more than 130,000 of 500,000 tickets for the World Cup had been sold less than two days after over-the-counter sales began last week at ticketing centers and some bank branches.
